DOC.detailed_description: This single center study UC Davis MIND Institute . Children fragile x syndrome age 6-17yrs , inclusive randomize 1:1 ratio receive ganaxolone placebo treatment 6 week , discontinue treatment washout 2 week , cross opposite treatment another 6 week . The primary aim study assess efficacy ganaxolone treatment compare placebo clinical behavior anxiety attention measure Clinician 's Global Impression-Improvement ( CGI-I ) . The key secondary efficacy measure Pediatric Anxiety Scale ( PARS ) . Other secondary efficacy measure include visual analog scale ( VAS ) , Anxiety , Depression , Attention , Mood Scale ( ADAMS ) , Swanson , Nolan , Pelham-IV Questionnaire ( SNAP-IV ) , Aberrant Behavior Checklist- Community Edition ( ABC-C ) . Tolerability safety monitor routine vital sign , physical/neurological exam , ECGs , clinical laboratory adverse event assessment .
